overview_of_class:
Chemistry laboratory techniques applied to materials science and nanotechnology. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on experiments.

Chemistry 122-0 is the laboratory course associated with Chemistry 102-0.
name: General Inorganic Chem Lab
title: WCAS CHEM 122-0-33 General Inorganic Chem Lab
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 102-0.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Chemistry laboratory techniques applied to materials science and nanotechnology. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on experiments.

Chemistry 122-0 is the laboratory course associated with Chemistry 102-0.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: Grade of C- or better in Chemistry 101-0 and Chemistry 121-0.

Students enrolled in Chemistry 102-0 must also enroll in Chemistry 122-0.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. Electronic Lab Notebook (details to be provided in course syllabus)
2. Approved laboratory safety eyewear
3. 100% Cotton laboratory coat

Items 2 and 3 will be sold during the first week of classes. Details TBA.

subject: CHEM
